name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Advanced Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience delivering high-performance applications in complex environments. Proficient in key technologies including **C#**, **ASP.NET**, **SQL**, **Microsoft SQL Server**, **JavaScript**, **AJAX**, and **GitHub**. Experienced in implementing **CI/CD** processes utilizing **Jenkins** and **Git** to streamline software development and ensure quality assurance (QA). Adept in aligning solutions with engineering principles, leveraging problem-solving capabilities to troubleshoot and enhance system functionality. 

Skilled in developing and maintaining robust applications with a strong focus on cloud-native patterns deployed on **Azure**. Additionally, I have hands-on expertise in **JavaScript** frameworks (React, Next.js, Vue) and backend technologies including **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. My experience extends to building AI/ML platforms that support predictive analytics and real-time processing, alongside a robust understanding of MLOps frameworks such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Committed to compliance-driven development aligning with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.
